convenience.par: See how our solutions can help you sell, traffic, and operate digital content across an out-of-home network of any size, more easily than ever before.

campaignPlanning.title: Advanced campaign tools that drive more revenue
campaignPlanning.par: Take advantage of real-time inventory availability and instantly book flexibly scheduled and dynamically delivered digital out-of-home campaigns.

contentNetworkManagement.title: Save time by automating your network management
contentNetworkManagement.par: Rely on automated campaign workflows to play the right content at the right time and gain complete visibility into your network's performance with in-depth campaign reporting.

staticOperations.title: Streamlined charting and work orders for static campaigns
staticOperations.par: Get more from your static faces with our centralized asset management and campaign booking tool that syncs with real-time work order status, stock levels, and bill poster communications.

globalProgrammaticSSP.title: Generate new revenue programmatically
globalProgrammaticSSP.par: Complement your direct sales with a real-time programmatic pipeline composed of global buyers and ads that you approve of.

localSignageMessaging.title: Make your local content shine in every language
localSignageMessaging.par: Enable onsite teams to easily create custom digital signage messages while remaining on brand with a template-based tool that is simple enough for anyone to use.

audienceCampaigns.title: Unlock new opportunities and additional revenue
audienceCampaigns.par: Broadsign's ad server provides you with sophisticated targeting tools to help your sales teams plan and sell campaigns, optimize your inventory,  and reach target audiences at the most compelling moments.

q1.quote: Since our transition to Broadsign, we've been able to streamline our workflow, become more flexible and react more quickly to changes made by advertisers.
